name: Defly
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: DEFLY is the utility token of the Defly Wallet. Defly Wallet is Algorand’s main DEFI wallet for decentralized trading. It combines charts, swaps, and stats in one mobile app bringing real-time markets and portfolio monitoring to DEFI.
